site.name: Nullianism
site.description: Okpukpe mbu nke ụwa nke sayensị mepere emepe

hero.title: Nullianism
hero.subtitle: Okpukpe mbu nke ụwa nke sayensị mepere emepe.

footer.aboutDescription: Okpukpe mbu nke ụwa nke sayensị mepere emepe dabere na ọchịchọ ịmata ihe na echiche na-akpachapụ anya.
footer.builtWith: E wuru ya na ịhụnanya maka ọmụma

community.title: Obodo Nullianism
community.howToBecomeTitle: Olee otú ị ga-esi bụrụ Nullian?
community.howToBecomeText: Ọ bụrụ na ị na-ekekọrịta echiche ndị e gosipụtara ebe a, tụlee onwe gị dị ka Nullian. Enweghị usoro ndị gọọmentị chọrọ. Okpukpe anyị adịghị etiti.
community.howToHelpTitle: Olee otú ị ga-esi nyere ọrụ aka?
community.bulletSuggestRest: maka iwu na omume site na {ISSUES} na {PULLS} na ndekọ anyị.

resources.title: Akụrụngwa
resources.subtitle: Nke a bụ ihe ndị bara uru na njikọ.
resources.recommendedPlaceholder: Ndepụta akwụkwọ na ihe ndị ọzọ ga-agbakwunye site na obodo.

notFound.title: Achataghị ibe ahụ
notFound.description: O yiri ka ibe a anaghị adị n'ụwa ọmụma anyị.
